trans-unit.source: Allows access to field names and field types of objects that support the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 允许访问支持 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable" /> 接口的对象的字段名称和字段类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the field names of serialized objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置序列化对象的字段名称。

trans-unit.source: The field names of serialized objects.
trans-unit.target: 序列化对象的字段名称。

trans-unit.source: If a name is `null`, a default parameter name is used.
trans-unit.target: 名称的情况`null`，则使用默认参数名称。

trans-unit.source: This property's `get` and `set` accessors are protected by a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter?displayProperty=nameWithType> specified.
trans-unit.target: 此属性`get`和`set`访问器受<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand?displayProperty=nameWithType>为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the field types of the serialized objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置序列化对象的字段类型。

trans-unit.source: The field types of the serialized objects.
trans-unit.target: 序列化对象的字段类型。

trans-unit.source: This property's `get` and `set` accessors are protected by a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter?displayProperty=nameWithType> specified.
trans-unit.target: 此属性`get`和`set`访问器受<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand?displayProperty=nameWithType>为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。
